summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use; adding Subtitle III, Exhibit A to Chapter 23.32, Chapter 23.45, Sections 23.34.36, 23.34.38, 23.34.40, 23.34.42, 23.34.44, 23.40.10, 23.86.12, 23.86.14, 23.86.16, 23.86.18. 23.86.20, 23.86.22; revising Sections 23.16.02, 23.30.02, 23.54.10, 23.54.20, 23.54.30, 23.76.06, 23.76.30,, 23.84.04, 23.84.06 23.84.18, 23.84.20, 23.84.30, 23.84.32, 23.84.36, 23.84.38, 23.86.06, 23.86.10 of Title 23; repealing Chapter 24.98 to provide for platting requirements and multi-family Zones in Title 23, and to delete superseded platting requirements in the Title 24.
